mapper.select: SELECT STRID, STRTITLE, STRCONT, STRIP, STRCOUNT, STRDATE, BOARDID, MEMID FROM STRUMN
SELECT STRID, STRTITLE, STRCONT, STRIP, STRCOUNT, STRDATE, BOARDID, MEMID FROM STRUMN WHERE STRTITLE LIKE #{sw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STRUMN ( STRTITLE, STRCONT, STRIP, BOARDID, MEMID, STRTYPE ) VALUES ( #{strtitle}, #{strcont}, #{strip}, #{boardid}, #{memid}, #{strtype} )
